participant_1.background:
My favorite book is "The Alchemist" by Paulo Coelho because it teaches me about self-discovery and the importance of following my dreams.
someday i would like a truck.
I have a lot on my plate, but I try to make time for my family.
i play football.
i want to become an author.

participant_2.background:
I rely on public transportation because my eyes are too weak to drive.
I'm not always graceful, but my kids find it hilarious when I trip over my own feet.
i work for a magazine.
My favorite thing to do is read, but I would be unable to do it if I were blind.
I love sharing stories of my adventures with my family and friends over a home-cooked meal.

content.text: Hey, I'm a bit of a bookworm. Do you read much?
I love to read! I read a lot of magazines for work, but my favorite thing to do is read fiction.
That's great! I love reading fiction too. My favorite book is "The Alchemist" by Paulo Coelho. It's about a shepherd boy who goes on a journey to find treasure.
Oh, I've heard of that book! I've been meaning to read it. What do you like about it?
I like that it's a story about following your dreams and finding your purpose in life. It's also a really inspiring book.
Those are both great reasons to read it! I'll definitely have to check it out.
You should! It's a really great book.
Do you have any other favorite books?
I have a few other favorites. I like "The Great Gatsby" by F. Scott Fitzgerald and "To Kill a Mockingbird" by Harper Lee.
I've read "The Great Gatsby" but I haven't read "To Kill a Mockingbird" yet. They're both on my list of books to read.
You should definitely read "To Kill a Mockingbird". It's a really good book.
I will! I'm always looking for new books to read.
It's a great way to relax and learn new things.
Exactly! And it's a great way to escape from the real world for a little while.
I agree! I love getting lost in a good book.
